cmd-resetplaylist-response: The server's autoplaylist has been reset.
cmd-help-no-perms: You don't have permission to use any commands. Run `{}help all` list every command anyway
cmd-help-response:
For information about a particular command, run `{}help [command]`
For further help, see https://just-some-bots.github.io/MusicBot/
cmd-help-all: Only showing commands you can use, for a list of all commands, run `{}help all`
cmd-blacklist-invalid: Invalid option '{0}' specified, use +, -, add, or remove
cmd-blacklist-added: {0} users have been added to the blacklist
cmd-blacklist-none: None of those users are in the blacklist.
cmd-blacklist-removed: {0} users have been removed from the blacklist
cmd-save-exists: This song is already in the autoplaylist.
cmd-save-invalid: There is no valid song playing.
cmd-joinserver-response:
Click here to add me to a server: 
{}
cmd-play-spotify-album-process: Processing Spotify album **{0}**. This may take a while for large albums.
cmd-play-spotify-album-queued: Spotify album **{0}** has been added to the queue with **{1}** songs.
cmd-play-spotify-playlist-process: Processing Spotify playlist **{0}**. This may take a while for large playlists.
cmd-play-spotify-playlist-queued: Spotify playlist **{0}** has been added to the queue with **{1}** songs.
cmd-play-spotify-unsupported: That is not a supported Spotify URI or URL.
cmd-play-spotify-invalid: You either provided an invalid Spotify URI or URL, or an unknown problem occurred.
cmd-play-spotify-unavailable: I am currently not configured to support Spotify URIs or URLs at the moment. Ask a bot admin to set this up.
cmd-play-limit: You have reached your enqueued song limit `({0})`.
cmd-play-noinfo: Sorry, that video cannot be played. Is it a stream? If so, please use the {0}stream command.
cmd-play-nodata: I'm having issues extracting the info from the search string since youtubedl returned no data and might be broken. You may need to restart me if this continues to happen.
cmd-play-playlist-gathering-1: Processing playlist information for **{0}** songs{1}. This may take a while for large playlists.
cmd-play-playlist-maxduration: No songs were added because all songs were over max duration `(%ss)`.
cmd-play-playlist-reply: Enqueued **%s** to be played. Position in queue: **%s**
cmd-play-playlist-invalid: Sorry, but that playlist cannot be played.
cmd-play-playlist-process: Processing **{0}** songs. This may take a while for large playlists.
cmd-play-playlist-queueerror: Oops. There has been an error handling the requested playlist `{0}`. Queue canceled. Please try another playlist.
cmd-play-playlist-skipped: Additionally, the current song was skipped for being too long.
cmd-play-playlist-reply-secs: Playlist processing completed in **{0}** seconds. **{1}** songs have been added to the queue. Shuffle the queue by typing `{2}shuffle`.
cmd-play-song-limit: That song exceeds the maximum duration you are allowed to queue: `({0} > {1})` seconds.
cmd-play-song-reply: Enqueued **%s** to be played. Position in queue: **%s**
cmd-play-badextractor: Sorry, but you do not have permission to play media from this service.
cmd-promote-nothing-playing: Nothing is currently playing so the queue cannot be modified.
cmd-promote-not-enough-entries: Nothing can be promoted since the queue is empty.
cmd-promote-invalid-song-number: That's not a valid song ID. Please choose a song number between `2` and `%s`.
cmd-promote-entry-already-at-top: That song is already going to play next.
cmd-promote-invalid-song-number-2: I can't find that song in the queue. Please choose a song number between `2` and `%s`.
cmd-promote-successful:
The song **%s** has been promoted to the top of the queue.
Estimated time until playing: **%s**
cmd-playnow-song-limit: Sorry, but you have reached your enqueued song limit (%s).
cmd-playnow-unplayable-entry: Sorry, but I'm unable to play that video. Please try something else.
cmd-playnow-no-data: I'm having issues extracting info from the search string because youtubedl returned no data and might be broken. You might need to restart me if this continues to happen.
cmd-playnow-playlist-not-allowed: I can't playnow playlists. Please specify a single song for me to playnow.
cmd-playnow-song-over-limit: That song's duration exceeds the limit (%s > %s). Please request a shorter song.
cmd-playnow-successful: The song **%s** has been added to the top of the queue to be played right away. The current song will now be skipped.
cmd_playnow-spotify-playlist: Sorry, but you cannot playnow Spotify playlists. Please add the playlist to the queue using `{0}play`.
cmd_playnow-spotify-album: Sorry, but you cannot playnow Spotify albums. Please add the album to the queue using `{0}play`.
cmd-playnext-song-limit: Sorry, but you have reached your enqueued song limit (%s).
cmd-playnext-unplayable-entry: Sorry, but I'm unable to play that video. Please try something else.
cmd-playnext-no-data: I'm having issues extracting info from the search string because youtubedl returned no data and might be broken. You might need to restart me if this continues to happen.
cmd-playnext-playlist-not-allowed: I can't playnext playlists. Please specify a single song for me to playnext.
cmd-playnext-song-over-limit: That song's duration exceeds the limit (%s > %s). Please request a shorter song.
cmd-playnext-successful: The requested song **%s** has been added to the queue. Position in queue: **Up next!**
cmd_playnext-spotify-playlist: Sorry, but you cannot playnext Spotify playlists. Please add the playlist to the queue using `{0}play`.
cmd_playnext-spotify-album: Sorry, but you cannot playnext Spotify albums. Please add the album to the queue using `{0}play`.
cmd-stream-limit: You have reached your enqueued song limit ({0})
cmd-search-limit: You have reached your playlist item limit ({0})
cmd-search-noquote: Please quote your search query properly.
cmd-search-searchlimit: You cannot search for more than %s videos
cmd-np-none: There are no songs queued! Queue something with {0}play.
cmd-summon-novc: You are not in a voice channel!
cmd-summon-noperms-connect: Cannot join channel `{0}`, no permission to connect.
cmd-summon-noperms-speak: Cannot join channel `{0}`, no permission to speak.
cmd-summon-reply: Connected to `{0.name}` on `{1.name}`. Please type `{2}help` to learn more about what I can do.
cmd-remove-missing: Nothing found in the queue from user `%s`
cmd-remove-noperms: You do not have the valid permissions to remove that entry from the queue, make sure you're the one who queued it or have instant skip permissions
cmd-remove-invalid: Invalid number. Use {}queue to find queue positions.
cmd-skip-none: Can't skip! The player is not playing!
cmd-skip-dl: The next song (`%s`) is downloading, please wait.
cmd-skip-force-noperms: You do not have permission to force skip.
cmd-skip-reply-skipped-1:
Your skip for `{0}` was acknowledged.
The vote to skip has been passed.{1}
cmd-skip-reply-voted-1:
Your skip for `{0}` was acknowledged.
**{1}** more {2} required to vote to skip this song.
cmd-volume-unreasonable-relative: Unreasonable volume change provided: {}{:+} -> {}%.  Provide a change between {} and {:+}.
cmd-volume-unreasonable-absolute: Unreasonable volume provided: {}%. Provide a value between 1 and 100.
cmd-option-autoplaylist-none: There are no entries in the autoplaylist file.
cmd-option-invalid-value: The value provided was not valid.
cmd-queue-none: There are no songs in the queue. Queue something with `{}play`.
cmd-clean-invalid: Invalid parameter. Please provide a number of messages to search.
playlists-noperms: You are not allowed to request playlists
playlists-limit: Playlist entries + your already queued songs reached limit ({0} + {1} > {2})
karaoke-enabled: Karaoke mode is enabled, please try again when its disabled.
left-no-owner-guilds: Left `{}` due to bot owner not being found in it.
